entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain changing to drizzle late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches late in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon then becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
